description: This is a story about a young boy who is superb at cooking. He opens a restaurant business, and becomes really famous. In his quest for fame, he participates in a cooking competition. Whenever the jurors taste his food, their reactions invoke images of dragons, volcanoes, hurricanes, tidal waves, and other natural phenomena. His food isn`t just good... it`s divine.
